alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Le Flore; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 2:05AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PUSHMATAHA...SOUTHEASTERN LATIMER AND SOUTHERN LE FLORE COUNTIES THROUGH 245 AM CDT... At 205 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Talihina to 5 miles southeast of Albion to 3 miles southwest of Nashoba to 3 miles south of Dunbar. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Talihina... Rattan... Albion... Octavia... Clayton Lake State Park... Talimena State Park... Snow... Bengal... Big Cedar... Nashoba... Kiamichi... Whitesboro... Dunbar... Muse... Oleta... Cloudy... Eubanks... Corinne... Sobol... Finley... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma.
